text: witnesses said it was like a volcano
going off in the heart of Manhattan
dozens of people were caught up in the
explosion
one person is believed to have serious
injuries police cleared the streets
fearing there might be other devices
well I heard a big big boom
til two big noises you're watching TV
and then there was a huge flash of light
like a and a big like boom and we went
outside to the front porch and we saw
like a huge cloud of smoke that smelled
like gunpowder an image of a badly
damaged rubbish container was published
by the police but they refused to say
the blast was caused by a bomb inside it
all they would say was that the
explosion was caused by an intentional
act there is no evidence at this point
of a terror connection to this incident
this is preliminary information it's
something we will be investigating very
carefully but there is no evidence at
this point of a terror of connection the
mayor also said there was no evidence of
a connection to a blast on Saturday
morning in New Jersey the FBI said a
pipe bomb went off just before a charity
run no one was injured there are some
reports that the first device was
concealed in a toolbox in front of a
building Andy Moore BBC news
